articles.author: AFP
articles.title: US says latest Iran response on nuclear deal 'not constructive' - Moneycontrol
articles.description: It is the latest in a back and forth between the adversaries via mediators from the European Union, whose foreign policy chief Josep Borrell on Wednesday had hoped for a resolution within days to revive the 2015 nuclear accord.
articles.content:
The United States said Thursday it had received a new response from Iran on reviving a nuclear deal but that it was not "constructive."

articles.title: HMD claims its latest Nokia smartphone is its most 'eco-friendly' yet - The Verge
articles.description: HMD is announcing a trio of new smartphones today, the Nokia G60, C31, and X30, and says the X30 is the ‘most eco-friendly smartphone’ it’s ever made. It’ll be available in Europe starting at €529.
articles.content:
